name: Lollipop T-shirt Size Small - Medium
description:
The Lollipopper T-shirt for girls,  a wonderful design by Raw Uncut

Please see the size guide below,  we only have small and medium.

Sizing guide for this T-shirts (+ - 1,5 cm / 0,5 inch)


SMALL 

Bust - 81 cm / 32 inch 

Waist - 36 cm  / 14 inch

Hips - 40 cm / 15.7 inch 

Length - 60 cm / 23.5 inch

Sleeve - 7 cm / 2.7 inch



MEDIUM 

Bust - 43 cm / 17  inch

Waist - 38 cm  / 15 inch

Hips - 43 cm / 17  inch

Length - 63 cm / 25 inch

Sleeve - 8 cm / 3 inch

Please note that shipping can take up to 30 days depending on the destination and the speed of the postal service,  I try to make sure that the item is dispatched as quickly as possible,  but due to various postal services,  I cannot say when the item will be delivered.

Many thanks
